file_insights.purpose: Module barrel export for FindingCard component
file_insights.content_summary: Single export statement re-exporting FindingCard from FindingCard.ts file

patterns_discovered.description: Using index.ts as a barrel export file to re-export components, simplifying import paths for consumers
Components organized in directory structure with dedicated index.ts for public API
patterns_discovered.significance: Enables clean import statements: `import { FindingCard } from './inspections'` instead of `import { FindingCard } from './inspections/FindingCard'`

gotchas_discovered.description: Task is straightforward with no technical complications or edge cases

approach_outcome.notes: Clean implementation on first attempt. Single file creation with correct export syntax and proper module structure.

recommendations.suggestion: Ensure all components in the inspections directory are exported through this index.ts file as they are added, maintaining a consistent public API
Consider documenting the public API of the inspections module if it grows beyond a single component
